mapper.insert: Insert into Patients(patient_name, age, phone, mail, account_id, id_card) Values(#{patientName}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{mail}, #{accountId}, #{idCard});
mapper.select: select a.patient_id, a.patient_name, a.age, a.phone , a.mail from Patients a inner join Accounts b on (b.id = a.account_id) where (b.account=#{account} and b.password=#{password})
